Class Start

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Start
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Start
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is the class that is mainly involved with the GUI aspect and functioning of the Game. It contains all the animations and also ensures smooth and proper functioning of the game.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Start(Main main)
      This is the Constructor of the Start Class and is used to create all GUI Components and place them on one screen.
